about.title: About me
about.description: Engineer with over 20 years of experience, passionate about front-end development, AI, best practices and web optimization.

paragraphs.p1: I am an engineer with over 20 years of experience in the technology sector. Throughout my career I have worked on multiple projects, always with a focus on technical excellence, continuous improvement and the application of best practices in software development.
paragraphs.p2: This personal blog was born as a space to experiment, share proof of concepts and delve into topics that I find particularly interesting. Here I document my learnings, challenges and solutions, with the goal of adding value to the community and maintaining constant professional evolution.
paragraphs.p3: Currently, my main interest is in modern front-end development, web performance optimization (WPO), accessibility and the integration of artificial intelligence in engineering processes. I firmly believe in the importance of clean, maintainable and efficient code, as well as the need to stay up to date with the best practices and trends in the sector.
paragraphs.p4: I am passionate about exploring how AI can transform the way we design and develop digital products, and I seek to apply this knowledge both in my personal and professional projects. This blog is my laboratory, my logbook and my way of contributing to the technological ecosystem.
paragraphs.p5: If you share these interests or simply want to exchange ideas, don't hesitate to get in touch with me. Welcome to my space for experimentation and learning!
